metadata.title: Wednesday, 26th July, 2023
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
parts: (a) whether the Government is aware that 10 dams were breached and more than 27 others were reported to be at high risk of failing in Southern Province during the 2022/2023 rainy season; and
(b) if so, what measures are being taken to rehabilitate the breached dams before the onset of the next rainy season.

(a) whether the Government is aware that private companies in Chama North Parliamentary Constituency and other parts of the country, are buying cotton from farmers at a low price of K6 per Kilogram as compared to the K15 per kilogram market price in the 2022 marketing season; and
(b) if so, what measures are being taken to avert further exploitation of the cotton farmers by the private buyers.
